summary: Client requested Sarah to start a requirements meeting; other team roles did not provide input or comments.

actions.task: Start and facilitate the requirements meeting as requested by the client

risks.risk: Lack of responses from key roles (Developer, Architect, QA, PM) may lead to incomplete requirements or missed dependencies.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with each non-responsive role to collect their input before or during the meeting; schedule additional focused sessions if necessary.
